TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit AssemblyName extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Runtime.InteropServices._AssemblyName, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class AssemblyName Implements _AssemblyName, ICloneable, IDeserializationCallback, ISerializable

public ref class AssemblyName sealed : ICloneable, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_AssemblyName, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 完整描述程序集的唯一标识。

span.span: Describes an assembly's unique identity in full.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含有关程序集，你可以使用对该程序集绑定信息。The object contains information about an assembly, which you can use to bind to that assembly. 程序集的标识由以下内容组成：An assembly's identity consists of the following: - 简单名称。Simple name. - 版本号。Version number. - 加密密钥对。Cryptographic key pair. - 支持的区域性。Supported culture. 简单名称通常是不带扩展名的清单文件的文件名。The simple name is typically the file name for the manifest file without its extension. 密钥对包含公钥和私钥的密钥，用于创建强名称签名的程序集。The key pair includes a public and private key, used to create strong-name signatures for assemblies. 所有支持公共语言运行时编译器将发出的嵌套类的简单名称和反射构造查询时，根据以下约定的重整的名称。All compilers that support the common language runtime will emit the simple name of a nested class, and reflection constructs a mangled name when queried, in accordance with the following conventions. |分隔符Delimiter|含义Meaning| |---------------|-------------| |反斜杠 (\\)Backslash (\\)|转义字符。Escape character.| |逗号 （，）Comma (,)|之前的程序集名称。Precedes the assembly name.| |加号 （+）Plus sign (+)|前面有嵌套的类。Precedes a nested class.| 例如，一个类的完全限定的名称可能如下所示：For example, the fully qualified name for a class might look like this: ContainingClass+NestedClass,MyAssemblyContainingClass+NestedClass,MyAssembly 一个"+ +"变为"\\+\\+"，和一个"\\"变为"\\\\"。A "++" becomes "\\+\\+", and a "\\" becomes "\\\\". 可以保持此限定的名，并在以后使用它来加载。This qualified name can be persisted and later used to load the . 若要搜索并加载，使用与类型名称只有或程序集限定的类型名称。To search for and load a , use either with the type name only or with the assembly qualified type name. 类型名称仅将查找的调用方的程序集中，然后在系统程序集。 with the type name only will look for the in the caller's assembly and then in the System assembly. 使用程序集限定的类型名称将会查找任何程序集中。 with the assembly qualified type name will look for the in any assembly. 完全指定必须具有主版本、 次版本、 内部版本号和修订号参数名称、 区域性、 公钥标记。A fully specified must have the name, culture, public key or public key token, major version, minor version, build number, and revision number parameters. 最后一个四个参数封装在类型。The last four are packaged in the type. 若要创建一个简单的名称，创建对象使用默认构造函数，并将。To create a simple name, create an object using the default constructor and set the . 其他属性都是可选的。The other properties are optional. 若要创建完整的强名称，创建对象使用默认构造函数，并将和。To create a full strong name, create an object using the default constructor and set the and . 其他属性都是可选的。The other properties are optional. 使用和设置公用密钥和强名称。Use and to set the public key and the strong name. 强名称签名始终使用哈希算法。The strong name signing always uses the hash algorithm. 若要确保正确构造的名称，请使用以下属性：To ensure that the names are constructed correctly, use the following properties: - - - 你还可以通过获取名称`/l`选项与[Gacutil.exe （全局程序集缓存工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/gacutil-exe-gac-tool.md)You can also get the name by using the `/l` option with the [Gacutil.exe (Global Assembly Cache Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/gacutil-exe-gac-tool.md) 部分指定的强名称，创建对象使用默认构造函数，并将名称和公钥。For a partially specified strong name, create an object using the default constructor and set the name and public key. 创建使用此程序集可以更高版本使用程序集链接器 (Al.exe) 进行签名。An assembly created using such an can be signed later using the Assembly Linker (Al.exe). 可以指定的公钥和一个具有不一致的值。It is possible to specify a public key and a with inconsistent values. 这可以是开发人员方案中十分有用。This can be useful in developer scenarios. 在这种情况下，公钥检索与指定正确的公共密钥，while指定在开发期间使用的公共和私有密钥。In this case, the public key retrieved with specifies the correct public key, while the specifies the public and private keys used during development. 当运行时检测到不匹配和公钥，它会查找在注册表中正确的密钥相匹配的公共密钥。When the runtime detects a mismatch between the and the public key, it looks up in the registry the correct key that matches the public key. 显示名称的格式是以逗号分隔的 Unicode 字符串开头的名称，如下所示：The format of the display name of an is a comma-delimited Unicode string that begins with the name, as follows: `Name <,Culture = CultureInfo> <,Version = Major.Minor.Build.Revision> <, StrongName> <,PublicKeyToken> '\0'` `Name` 是程序集的文本名称。`Name` is the textual name of the assembly. `CultureInfo` 是 RFC1766 格式定义区域性。`CultureInfo` is the RFC1766-format-defined culture. `Major``Minor`， `Build`，和`Revision`是主要版本、 次版本、 内部版本号和修订号的程序集。`Major`, `Minor`, `Build`, and `Revision` are the major version, minor version, build number, and revision number of the assembly. `StrongName` 为十六进制编码低序位 64 位的生成使用 sha-1 哈希算法的公钥和公钥由指定的哈希值。`StrongName` is the hexadecimal-encoded low-order 64 bits of the hash value of the public key generated using the SHA-1 hashing algorithm and the public key specified by . `PublicKeyToken` 是由指定的十六进制编码的公共密钥。`PublicKeyToken` is the hexadecimal-encoded public key specified by . 十六进制编码定义为二进制对象的每个字节转换为两个十六进制字符，按照从最低到最高有效字节。Hexadecimal encoding is defined as the conversion of each byte of a binary object to two hexadecimal characters, progressing from least to most significant byte. 必要时，将添加附加的显示值。Additional display values will be added as deemed necessary. 如果已知的完整的公钥，然后 PublicKey 可能替换为 StrongName 的。If the full public key is known, then PublicKey may be substituted for StrongName. 另请注意，除`Name`，必须先出现，参数的词法顺序并不重要。Also note that except for `Name`, which must come first, the lexical order of parameters is unimportant. 但是，任何参数 (`Version`， `Culture`，`StrongName`或`PublicKey`) 不是专门认为集被省略，和视为部分。However, any parameter (`Version`, `Culture`, `StrongName` or `PublicKey`) not specifically set is considered to be omitted, and the is then considered partial. 指定部分的信息时，必须按照上面介绍的顺序指定 Name 参数。When specifying partial information, Name parameters must be specified in the order described above. 提供显示名称、 约定时`StrongName =null`或`PublicKey= null`指示是否需要绑定并将与简单命名的程序集匹配。When supplying a display name, the convention `StrongName =null` or `PublicKey= null` indicates that binding and matching against a simply named assembly is required. 此外，约定`Culture= ""`（双引号表示空字符串） 指示匹配的默认区域性。Additionally, the convention `Culture= ""` (double quote representing an empty string) indicates matching against the default culture. 下面的示例演示为具有默认区域性的简单命名程序集。The following example shows an for a simply named assembly with default culture. ``` ExampleAssembly, Culture="" ``` 下面的示例演示区域性为“en”的强名称程序集的完全指定的引用。The following example shows a fully specified reference for a strongly named assembly with culture "en". ``` ExampleAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=en, PublicKeyToken=a5d015c7d5a0b012 ``` ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用各种反射类来分析程序集中包含的元数据。This example shows how to use various reflection classes to analyze the metadata contained in an assembly. [!code-cpp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CPP/reflection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CS/Reflection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/VB/Reflection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为的动态程序集`MyAssembly.exe`并将其保存到硬盘。The following example creates a dynamic assembly named `MyAssembly.exe` and saves it to your hard disk. 运行该示例后，你可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)来检查程序集元数据。After running the example, you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the assembly metadata. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CPP/assemblyname_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CS/assemblyname_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/VB/assemblyname_constructor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的显示名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供`assemblyName`分析时，和新的相应字段初始化中的显示名称的值。The supplied `assemblyName` is parsed, and the appropriate fields of the new are initialized with values from the display name. 这是推荐的方法来分析显示名称。This is the recommended way of parsing display names. 不建议编写你自己的代码来分析显示名称。Writing your own code to parse display names is not recommended. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的实例显示名称。The following example creates an instance of from a display name. 显示名称的各个元素的属性的形式输出到控制台对象。The individual elements of the display name are output to the console as properties of the object. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_Constructor_2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor_2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_Constructor_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor_2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_Constructor_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor_2/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CodeBase { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置程序集的 URL 位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the assembly as a URL.

value.span: 一个字符串，它是程序集的 URL 位置。

span.span: A string that is the URL location of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加载程序集时，也可以使用获取此值属性。When an assembly is loaded, this value can also be obtained using the property. 如果程序集被加载作为字节数组，该属性返回的位置的调用方方法重载，未加载的程序集的位置。If the assembly was loaded as a byte array, this property returns the location of the caller of the method overload, not the location of the loaded assembly. > [!NOTE] > 不要使用并且仅带有属性集。Do not use an with only the property set. 属性不提供任何元素 （如名称或版本） 的程序集标识，因此加载不会发生根据负载通过标识规则，如你所料从方法。The property does not supply any elements of the assembly identity (such as name or version), so loading does not occur according to load-by-identity rules, as you would expect from the method. 相反，使用负载从规则加载的程序集。Instead, the assembly is loaded using load-from rules. 有关使用加载源上下文的缺点的信息，请参阅方法重载或[用于程序集加载的最佳实践](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md)。For information about the disadvantages of using the load-from context, see the method overload or [Best Practices for Assembly Loading](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md). ## Examples 下面的示例发出动态程序集，并将其保存到当前目录。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集，属性用于指定的目录的程序集的保存位置。When the assembly is created, the property is used to specify the directory where the assembly is saved. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CPP/assemblyname_codebase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CS/assemblyname_codebase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_CodeBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/VB/assemblyname_codebase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例发出动态程序集，并将其保存到当前目录。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集，属性用于指定该程序集具有的公共密钥。When the assembly is created, the property is used to specify that the assembly has a public key. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CPP/assemblyname_keypair.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CS/assemblyname_keypair.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_KeyPair#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/VB/assemblyname_keypair.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取程序集的全名（也称为显示名称）。

span.span: Gets the full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.

value.span: 作为程序集的全名（也称为显示名称）的字符串。

span.span: A string that is the full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示名称通常由简单名称、 版本号、 支持的区域性和公钥组成。The display name typically consists of the simple name, version number, supported culture, and public key. 例如:For example: ``` mylib, Version=1.2.1900.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=a14f3033def15840 ``` 不建议编写你自己的代码来分析显示名称。Writing your own code to parse display names is not recommended. 相反，将传递到的显示名称构造函数，也不能对其进行分析将填充新的相应字段。Instead, pass the display name to the constructor, which parses it and populates the appropriate fields of the new . 加载程序集时，也可以使用获取此值属性。When an assembly is loaded, this value can also be obtained using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例发出动态程序集，并将其保存到当前目录。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集，该代码示例设置， ， ，和属性，它们一起构成程序集的完整名称，或显示名称。When the assembly is created, the code example sets the , , , and properties, which together comprise an assembly's full name, or display name. 属性随后用于检索显示名称。The property is then used to retrieve the display name. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CPP/assemblyname_codebase.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CS/assemblyname_codebase.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_CodeBase#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/VB/assemblyname_codebase.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此项才适用如果文件包含程序集清单。This will only work if the file contains an assembly manifest. 此方法使该文件以打开和关闭，但该程序集添加到此域。This method causes the file to be opened and closed, but the assembly is not added to this domain. ## Examples 下面的示例获取磁盘上的程序集。The following example gets the for an assembly on disk. 它将不会运行，除非替换字符串"MyAssembly.exe"与一个程序集 （包括路径，如有必要） 的文件名称在硬盘上。It will not run unless you replace the string "MyAssembly.exe" with the file name of an assembly (including the path, if necessary) on your hard disk. 或者，你可以为"MyAssembly.exe"来编译此示例。Alternatively, you can compile this example as "MyAssembly.exe". [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/CPP/assemblyname_getassemblyname.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/CS/assemblyname_getassemblyname.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/VB/assemblyname_getassemblyname.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例发出动态程序集，并将其保存到当前目录。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集，方法用于为程序集的公共密钥。When the assembly is created, the method is used to give the assembly a public key. 方法随后用于检索公钥，显示到控制台。The method is then used to retrieve the public key, which is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CPP/assemblyname_keypair.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CS/assemblyname_keypair.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_KeyPair#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/VB/assemblyname_keypair.vb#2)]

exception.span: 提供了公钥（例如使用 方法），但未提供公钥标记。

span.span: A public key was provided (for example, by using the method), but no public key token was provided.

span.span: The hash algorithm used by the assembly manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、属性返回的对象方法是如果没有引用的程序集，哈希算法或引用的哈希算法程序集不通过标识枚举。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property of an object that is returned by the method is if there is no hash algorithm for the referenced assembly, or if the hash algorithm of the referenced assembly is not identified by the enumeration. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，属性返回在此情况下。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, the property returned in this situation. ## Examples 下面的示例发出动态程序集，并将其保存到当前目录。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集，属性用于设置程序集清单的哈希算法。When the assembly is created, the property is used to set the hash algorithm for the assembly manifest. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CPP/assemblyname_codebase.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CS/assemblyname_codebase.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_CodeBase#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/VB/assemblyname_codebase.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当运行时加载程序集时，不设置属性。When the runtime loads an assembly, it does not set the property. 属性 getter 才有用如果用户在使用之前设置了属性对象，以便创建动态程序集，并随后想要检索的密钥对。The getter for the property is only useful if the user set the property before using the object to create a dynamic assembly, and subsequently wants to retrieve the key pair. ## Examples 下面的示例发出动态程序集，并将其保存到当前目录。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集，属性用于设置程序集的公钥和私钥的加密密钥。When the assembly is created, the property is used to set the assembly's public and private cryptographic keys. .. The simple name of the assembly.

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回程序集的全名，即所谓的显示名称。

span.span: Returns the full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅说明返回字符串的格式。See the description of for the format of the returned string. ## Examples 下面的示例获取一个假想的对象`MyAssembly.exe`程序集，然后使用方法可以检索完整的程序集名称，或显示名称。The following example gets an object for a hypothetical `MyAssembly.exe` assembly, and then uses the method to retrieve the full assembly name, or display name. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/CPP/assemblyname_getassemblyname.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/CS/assemblyname_getassemblyname.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/VB/assemblyname_getassemblyname.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Version ^ Version { Version ^ get(); void set(Version ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置程序集的主版本号、次版本号、内部版本号和修订号。

span.span: Gets or sets the major, minor, build, and revision numbers of the assembly.

value.span: 一个对象，表示程序集的主版本号、次版本号、内部版本号和修订号。

span.span: An object that represents the major, minor, build, and revision numbers of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有组件的版本必须都是大于或等于零的整数。All components of the version must be integers greater than or equal to zero. 元数据限制主要、 次要、 生成和最大值的程序集的修订版本组件-1。Metadata restricts the major, minor, build, and revision components for an assembly to a maximum value of - 1. 如果组件超过此值，不会引发错误;但是，在动态程序集中，该组件为零。If a component exceeds this value, no error is thrown; however, in a dynamic assembly, that component is zero. ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何检索当前正在执行的程序集的版本。The first example shows how to retrieve the version of the currently executing assembly. 第二个示例演示如何使用属性指定的程序集版本时发出的动态程序集。The second example shows how to use the property to specify the assembly version when you emit a dynamic assembly. **示例 1****Example 1** 下面的示例检索并显示当前正在执行的程序集和包含的程序集的版本号类。The following example retrieves and displays the version numbers of the currently executing assembly and the assembly that contains the class. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName.Version/cpp/Example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName.Version/cs/Example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName.Version/vb/Example.vb#1)] **示例 2****Example 2** 下面的示例发出动态程序集，并将其保存到当前目录。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集，属性用于指定程序集的版本信息。When the assembly is created, the property is used to specify version information for the assembly. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_Constructor#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CPP/assemblyname_constructor.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_Constructor#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CS/assemblyname_constructor.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_Constructor#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/VB/assemblyname_constructor.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyVersionCompatibility VersionCompatibility { System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyVersionCompatibility get(); void set(System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyVersionCompatibility value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与程序集同其他程序集的兼容性相关的信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the information related to the assembly's compatibility with other assemblies.

value.span: 一个值，表示有关程序集同其他程序集的兼容性的信息。

span.span: A value that represents information about the assembly's compatibility with other assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信息指示，例如，程序集无法与其他版本由于冲突而进行并行执行通过设备驱动程序。 information indicates, for example, that the assembly cannot execute side-by-side with other versions due to conflicts over a device driver. 目前，始终返回，并且不由加载程序。Currently, always returns , and is not used by the loader. 此属性保留供将来的功能。This property is reserved for a future feature.
